Relation of what was taken from the rebels and came to this Arsenal, namely:  
Bronze pieces of caliber 9  
Said said of 6  
Field forge  
Armory  
Field repairs  
Sockets with lances  
Spoons with hooks  
Rudders with stoppers  
That is what I must relate because it is only what I think.  
War Arsenal, December 26, 1840.
